name: FurryConscom
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: FurryCons.com provides a list of furry conventions around the world. Using the FurryCons.com database, this Alexa Flash Briefing will tell you what fur cons are coming up this week so that you head out to meet other furries and fursuiters at a furry con near you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
